item.title: Need Help with ::NOCLIP
item.dc:creator: @Nintendo1 Nintendo
item.description:
@Nintendo1 wrote:

Yeckar i can Help you With 1 Thing…That is Not to Ban People

Just Erase the Code else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("noclip") && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("******")) { appendToBanned(playerName); }

item.title: Need Help with ::NOCLIP
item.dc:creator: @Yeckar Yeckar
item.description:
@Yeckar wrote:

Okay, My noclip is messed up. The code is:

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("noclip") && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("******")) { appendToBanned(playerName); }

I want it to do this: If an ADMIN ONLY noclip’s, they can noclip… but if a Mod or Player types it… Nothing happens. no banning or anything… Can anyone Help?

Read full topic
